item.description:
Ok since everyone likes the Sunset Social, Wino'es on the mountain top events..Here is something that takes it a bit further...its more of the enjoying of snacks and a good selection of wine, (but not too much) and enlightening conversation with great people,


this event will be close to a geological feature (I really dont like to tell , you have to see it to believe it) where a grill, table, and chairs can be placed for our relaxation, oh yes and the fire pit or 2...

Im making my roast beef and chez..peppers and onions..philly steak sanwitches..w. portougese rolls..or what ever i find at Beef Stew Leonards...yeh this time a bit more..
Rob and Laura missed out...
Wehen i yell "come and get it"..i mean my food..not me..remember that...

Bring something else...or i just get enough roast beef and you get the chez and peppers..and keep it simpler...either way... and bring your chairs...blankets etc...

Ok what is the place...?
Im not telling what it is you will see, ya will just have to go to find out...
some of you know and found this place to be mesmerizing....among other things...

Getting there:
From Hartford: Take 91 north to exit 40 (thats rte 20 to Bradley airport)
Pass Hamilton Standard, continue to the right to rte 20 towards New Gate Prison.
Pass new Gate Prison sign till you get to the intersection of 20 / 202 (Granby Center)
Stay on route 20 (west) for 3.5 miles, look left for rte 219 (Barkhamsted rd),
Take left onto rte 219 for apx 1.5 miles look left for the park entrance of Enders State Forest.
It has a small state park sign and log things for the entrance..it isnt all to easy to see...but if you look you can find it pretty easy..use the mileage reference as a better guild...
if you see Case rd to the left you just past it..


From Water town direction:
8 north...at the end of the exit loop
take a left (east) onto rte 44
then take a left onto rte 318,
near the reserviour take a left onto 219 north
you will intersect with 179, stay on 219 for about 2.5 miles, pass case rd, take a right into the park..

For other start locations, GPS, and Mapquest users, use 160 Barkhamsted Road, West Granby,
It will get you close enough.
Look at your maps though if you come from a different direction..

Back up plans for bad weather...
rain..cancelled..or move to another evening..
very light or possible rain(10 or 20 %) thats nothing.., meet at location, access situation, stay at location (set up overhead protection) or go to McLean Game preserve and party on the Cabin portch overlooking the small lake..till the cops and fire department feel sorry for people that look like they are their parents age that look homeless..eating food and passing the wine bottle around...US feel good about that ??..i think its great...works like a charm on them...
(directions later if necessary)...

Tuesday day: some rain ?
Tuesday Night: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 62. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

OK I DONT TAKE MUCH TO PREDICTIONS THIS FAR IN ADVANCE..but i will updat if it looks like its not good enough...on the day of the event..
